attributes.action: Stop MP's asking stupid questions in the House Of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's who are payed through our taxes, who are currently asking for a large pay rise, of our taxes, waste that money by asking stupid questions in the House Of Commons. Like Jane Kennedy M.P. who today asked the Prime Minister if he watched a football match last night and asked him if he supports a change in the Constitution to knight a dead man.
We would like M.P.s to ask questions that are relavant and important to the actual running of the country.
